roleset.name: moving aimlessly

example.name: both args
example.text: they are relegated to the bottom tier of the exhibit, or else the landscape would be dramatically altered by their rambling across the terrain.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on ramble-v.01.

roleset.name: talking aimlessly

roles.note: Arg1 in the verb frame contained both the utterance and the subject matter, which have been split up here.

example.name: argMs
example.text: It is just the same politically illiterate ramblings you hear from any Tory hating band wagoners , this should be left for the columns of Heat magazine rather than a debate forum .
example.arg: that you hear from any Tory hating band wagoners

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: His rambling of such things was normal behavior now.

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: And it wasn't so much her rambling about these organisms, but her pantomime-passion about said subject.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, ramble-v.02.
